author: The Editorial Board
title: Putinâ€™s Next Six Years
text:
Well, that was a nail-biter. Vladimir Putin won another six-year term as Russian President on Sunday, rolling up a mere 73.9% of the vote, according to a state-run exit poll before the votes were counted.

The exit pollsters had better hire food tasters in case the Kremlin strongman is unhappy with those estimates, including an expert in the Novichok nerve agent that is currently popular with Russian security. But then Mr. Putin did outperform the 63.6% he won in 2012. A good authoritarian these days has to maintain a modicum...
